mapper.insert: INSERT INTO application_setting ( id, application_id, application_setting_group_id, code, text, value, order_id, status, remark, modified_date, created_date ) VALUES ( #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{applicationId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{applicationSettingGroupId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{text,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{value,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orderId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP )
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(0) AS "Count" FROM application_setting WHERE id = #{id}

SELECT text FROM application_setting WHERE application_id = #{applicationId}
AND application_setting_group_id = '00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000'
AND application_setting_group_id IN ( SELECT id FROM application_setting_group WHERE name = #{applicationSettingGroupName} )
AND value = #{value} LIMIT 0, 1

SELECT value FROM application_setting WHERE application_id = #{applicationId}
AND application_setting_group_id = '00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000'
AND application_setting_group_id IN ( SELECT id FROM application_setting_group WHERE name = #{applicationSettingGroupName} )
AND text = #{text} LIMIT 0, 1
